鞇鞇鞇

鞇字的基本解释

鞇
yīn
车上的坐垫：“齐君重鞇而坐。”

鞇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yīn］
［《廣韻》於真切，平真，影。］
(1)车中的垫褥。
(2)泛指垫褥。

鞇字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　鞇； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1387第11
【廣韻】於眞切【集韻】【正韻】伊眞切，?音因。【說文】車重席。【韓詩外傳】子夏曰：齊君重鞇而坐，吾君單鞇而坐。【集韻】本作茵。亦作筃。

鞇字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
鞇字的起名意思

暂无。

鞇
Basic explanation of words
鞇
yīn
Cushion on the car: "Qi Jun sits heavily."
鞇
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yīn］
["Guangyun" is true, plain, and shadowy. ]
(1) The mattress in the car.
(2) Generally refers to mattresses.
鞇
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Leather Characters】　鞇; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1387 No. 11
[Guang Yun] Yu Yuqie [Jiyun] [Zheng Yun] Yi Yuqie,? Yinyin. [Said the text] The car takes a seat. [Han Shiwai Biography] Zi Xia said: Qi Jun sits heavily, and Wu Jun sits alone. [Ji Yun] This is a Yin. Also known as Yun.
鞇

鞇
Name meaning
Nothing.
